Output PIDs

A PID is a parameter ID. It is similar to DIDs with the major difference being PIDs are not static. They are dynamic signals that update throughout a test. An output PID is one you write and is sometimes called CPIDs or control packet identifier.

What do you want to do?

Add PID

To add a PID, right-click the object in the configuration tree and select Add PID from the shortcut menu.

Delete item

To delete, right-click the object in the configuration tree and select Delete from the shortcut menu.

Delete multiple items

To delete multiple items, right-click the object in the configuration tree and select Delete Multiple Items from the shortcut menu.
